to.info: Traded Tye McGinn to Sharks for 2015 third round pick on 2014-07-02

from.info: Traded T.J. Galiardi to Flames for 2015 fourth round pick on 2013-07-02

to.info: Traded 2014 second round pick (#46-Julius Bergman) to Sharks for 2014 second round pick (#51-Jack Dougherty), 2015 fourth round pick on 2014-06-28

from.info: Traded Dan Boyle to Islanders for 2015 conditional pick (fourth round if Boyle re-signs with Islanders, else fifth round) on 2014-06-05

Traded Tyler Kennedy to Islanders for conditional draft pick (2016 third round pick (less favorable of Canucks, Islanders picks) if Islanders win the 2015 Stanley Cup and Kennedy plays in at least 50% of games in the Finals, else 2015 seventh round pick) on 2015-03-02 (Unconfirmed if pick is Ducks or Islanders pick.)
Traded Brad Stuart to Avalanche for 2016 second round pick, 2017 sixth round pick on 2014-07-01

to.info: Traded Brenden Dillon to Sharks for Jason Demers, 2016 third round pick on 2014-11-21

from.info: Traded James Sheppard to Rangers for 2016 fourth round pick on 2015-03-01
Traded James Livingston to Kings for 2016 conditional seventh round pick on 2014-03-05 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)
Traded Brad Stuart to Avalanche for 2016 second round pick, 2017 sixth round pick on 2014-07-01
Traded Andrew Desjardins to Blackhawks for Ben Smith, 2017 conditional seventh round pick on 2015-03-02 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)
